act:
487804 THE HYDERABAD EXPORT DUTIES (VALIDATION) REPEAL ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 26 OF 2001 [ 29th August, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Hyderabad Export Duties (Validation) Act, 1955.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1671221 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Hyderabad Export Duties (Validation) Repeal Act, 2001.
578059 2Repeal of Act 20 of 1955.- The Hyderabad Export Duties (Validation) Act, 1955 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
